thought: The current Gmail send action uses static params which causes all emails to have the same content. I need to update the Gmail send action to not use static params but instead utilize the input_data JSON fields for dynamic email sending.
plan: Remove static params in action_2 to allow dynamic email sending based on input_data.
Set params to empty dict as Gmail action uses input_data for parameters.
Test sending emails with dynamic content for each item.
Verify each email is sent with correct subject and message from input_data.
criticism: Using static params in Gmail send action prevents dynamic email content. This fix will enable sending personalized emails per commercial entry.
